response.overview: Hahaha, what the heck, here comes Burl back into the review briefly, but who knows how long it'll be. I'm here to review a picture I saw recently, it's Guy Maddin's latest project. He brings us Careful and a few others who work here with two brothers named Johnson. The picture is a little woodsy number called Rumors!
response.tagline: Afdah movies is a free movie streaming website that allows you to watch the latest movies and TV shows.
response.title: Rumours 2024 – Film Review
